physicalDescription.extent: The two letters are arranged in chronological order in the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a letter from Bernard Rawdon Reilly (Governor and Commander-in-Chief of Aden) to Malcolm MacDonald (Secretary of State for the Colonies), and a reply from MacDonald to Reilly. The correspondence relates to the concerns of Sir Hormusjee Cowasjee Dinshaw about the future of the Aden Salt Industry. These items were forwarded to the India Office in May 1939.
